oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Guy Clark - 2006-09-13
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Second of three Artist in Residence performances by Guy Clark from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 13, 2006. Special guests include: Verlon Thompson, Will Kimbrough, Rodney Crowell, Vince Gill.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Guy Clark; Verlon Thompson; Will Kimbrough; Rodney Crowell; Vince Gill;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Walk In Music -- Opening comments by Kyle Young -- Introduction of guests -- The Partner Nobody Chose [Guy Clark and Rodney Crowell) -- Stuff That Works (Guy Clark and Rodney Crowell) -- Act Like Nothing's Wrong (Will Kimbrough) -- A Whisper And A Scream (Verlon Thompson) -- Heartbroke (Guy Clark) -- Beer Drinker's Waltz (Rodney Crowell) -- Tornado Time In Texas (Guy Clark) -- Exposé (Guy Clark) -- Sight For Sore Eyes (Vince Gill) -- Oklahoma Borderline (Vince Gill) -- She's Crazy For Leaving (Guy Clark) -- Short Break Intermission -- Jack Of All Trades (Guy Clark and Rodney Crowell) -- That Old Time Feeling (Guy Clark) -- Joe Walker's Mare (Verlon Thompson) -- She Ain't Going Nowhere (Rodney Crowell) -- I Walk The Line (Revisited) (Rodney Crowell and Will Kimbrough) -- Champion Of The World (Will Kimbrough) -- Black Diamond Strings (Guy Clark) -- South Coast Of Texas (Guy Clark) -- Jenny Dreamed Of Trains (Vince Gill) -- Old Friends (Guy Clark) -- Encore -- Pancho And Lefty (Rodney Crowell) Recording ends before song does. Walk In Music -- Opening comments by Kyle Young -- Introduction of guests -- The Partner Nobody Chose [Guy Clark and Rodney Crowell) -- Stuff That Works (Guy Clark and Rodney Crowell) -- Act Like Nothing's Wrong (Will Kimbrough) -- A Whisper And A Scream (Verlon Thompson) -- Heartbroke (Guy Clark) -- Beer Drinker's Waltz (Rodney Crowell) -- Tornado Time In Texas (Guy Clark) -- Expose (Guy Clark) -- Sight For Sore Eyes (Vince Gill) -- Oklahoma Borderline (Vince Gill) -- She's Crazy For Leaving (Guy Clark) -- Short Break Intermission -- Jack Of All Trades (Guy Clark and Rodney Crowell) -- That Old Time Feeling (Guy Clark) -- Joe Walker's Mare (Verlon Thompson) -- She Ain't Going Nowhere (Rodney Crowell) -- I Walk The Line (Revisited) (Rodney Crowell and Will Kimbrough) -- Champion Of The World (Will Kimbrough) -- Black Diamond Strings (Guy Clark) -- South Coast Of Texas (Guy Clark) -- Jenny Dreamed Of Trains (Vince Gill) -- Old Friends (Guy Clark) -- Encore -- Pancho And Lefty (Rodney Crowell) Recording ends before song does.
